Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Marine Drive/ Gordon Terrance
ShortDescription: SB 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp buses are rrtd via Sheridan, Broadway, Belmont, Lake Shore Dr and Sheridan due to blockage nr Marine Drive/Gordon Terrance.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Broadway, Belmont, Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan due to street blockage near Marine Drive/Gordon Terrance.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute near King Drive/63rd
ShortDescription: 3 King Dr buses rrtd NB via King Dr, Marquette, Cott Grv, 61st & King Dr; SB via King Dr, 61st, Prairie, 63rd & King Dr due to police activiry nr King Dri/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near King Drive/63rd.

  • Northbound buses will operate via King Drive, Marquette, Cottage Grove, 61st and King Drive, then resume theor normal route.
  • Southbound buses will operate via King Drive, 61st, Prairie, 63rd and King Drive, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
